body:
We ran into this during our initial switch to mercurial as well, so it isn't a new thing.

```irc
<mythmon> while cloning, "abort: No such file or directory: '/root/mozilla-central/media/omx-plugin/include/ics'"
<rhelmer> during the clone?! that's really weird
```
body_text:
